Class VoteService

Manages voting functionality within the bot, handling vote configuration, processing, and reward distribution.

VoteService(IPubSub, DbService, DiscordSocketClient, MuteService)

Initializes a new instance of the VoteService class, setting up dependencies and subscribing to voting-related pub/sub events.

Declaration
public VoteService(IPubSub pubSub, DbService db, DiscordSocketClient client, MuteService muteService)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IPubSub pubSub

The pub/sub system for event handling.
DbService db

The database service for data access.
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord client for interacting with the Discord API.
MuteService muteService

The service for managing mutes within the bot.

AddVoteRole(ulong, ulong, int)

Adds a vote role to the guild configuration, setting a timer for automatic role removal if specified.

Declaration
public Task<(bool, string)> AddVoteRole(ulong guildId, ulong roleId, int seconds = 0)
Parameters
Type Name Description
ulong guildId

The ID of the guild where the role is to be added.
ulong roleId

The ID of the role to be added as a vote role.
int seconds

The duration in seconds after which the role should be automatically removed. Zero for indefinite.
Returns
Type Description
Task<(bool, string)>

A tuple indicating success status and an optional error message.
